title: Barbecued salmon with habanero-lime butter
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '110ml (4 fl oz) orange juice', '3 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon tequila', '1 tablespoon grated lime zest', '1 tablespoon minced habanero or Scotch bonnet chillies', '1 clove garlic, minced', '600g (1 lb 6 oz) salmon fillets', 'For the Habanero-Lime Butter', '4 tablespoons butter, softened', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '1 dessertspoon minced habanero or Scotch bonnet chillies', '1 dessertspoon grated lime zest']
